duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive commercial strategies to drive growth and profitability in the Consumer Products Business Unit across various categories.
Lead and manage a diverse team covering commercial and operations functions, including sales, marketing, customer service, supply chain, and financial planning & analysis.
Drive collaboration with the Global COP Team to optimize business success and strengthen the organization.
Proactively identify changes in the competitive environment, informing key stakeholders and modifying strategies and tactics accordingly.
Provide national forecast data, market share trends, and competitive analysis as part of the annual budgeting process.
Facilitate local consumer understanding and support the global COP team in North American market product development.
Develop processes and capabilities required to lead and manage an effective and efficient COP operation in North America.
Develop Direct to Consumer sales capabilities and manage online marketplaces for future category launches.
Establish and maintain effective relationships with external customers, being seen as a trusted business partner.
Manage P&L and all operations of COP, legal entity management, trade compliance, data protection, and shared services utilization for the entire legal entity.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Business Administration or similar education
